## Introduction

Interim report: who votes in NC? Using the NC voter files, identify who votes in NC so that these data can be used in conjunction with surveys and other data in order to predict outcomes of NC congressional elections. Present results in short (<5 min) video presentation on October 23. This report will be peer reviewed.

### Context: Why Is Voter Turnout Prediction Important
